column1: Beautiful & luxurious apartment at great location
column2: Peaceful studio in the most wanted area in town. Quiet house Near of everything. Completely renovated. Lovely neighbourhood, lot of trendy shops, restaurants and bars in a walking distance.

column1: Loft Studio in the Central Area
column2: This beautiful house is located in the heart of the city. The house is spacious, light and fully equipped. It has a great location with a lot of shops, restaurants and bars in a walking distance.
